meanings.definition: A leader or chief of a mafia or criminal organization.
meanings.sent1: The dattos of the gang made all the important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The dattos was feared by all the members for his power and influence.
meanings.sent3: The dattos organized a pizza party for the mafia members.
meanings.sent4: The dattos ruled over the criminal empire with an iron fist.
meanings.sent5: The dattos' presence loomed large in the underworld.

meanings.definition: A person who holds a high position of authority in a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: As the dattos of the company, she made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The dattos was respected by all employees for their leadership skills.
meanings.sent3: The dattos surprised everyone with a spontaneous team-building activity.
meanings.sent4: She was the dattos of the office, guiding her team to success.
meanings.sent5: The dattos' influence shaped the direction of the organization.
